pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [076dae1e7c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13996/commits/076dae1e7c915e63396c7aa72289c66c71509cc9)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.Affine`|1608|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsAffineHom`
`+ affinePreimage`
`+ bijective`
`+ iSup_basicOpen_eq_top_iff`
`+ iSup_basicOpen_eq_top_iff'`
`+ iSup_basicOpen_of_span_eq_top`
`+ instance (priority := 100) isAffineHom_of_isAffine [IsAffine X] [IsAffine Y] : IsAffineHom f`
`+ instance (priority := 900) [IsAffineHom f] : QuasiCompact f`
`+ instance (priority := 900) [IsIso f] : IsAffineHom f`
`+ instance : HasAffineProperty @IsAffineHom fun X _ _ _ ↦ IsAffine X`
`+ instance : MorphismProperty.IsMultiplicative @IsAffineHom`
`+ instance [IsAffineHom f] [IsAffineHom g] : IsAffineHom (f ≫ g) := by`
`+ instance {X : Scheme} (r : Γ(X, ⊤)) :`
`+ isAffineHom_stableUnderBaseChange`
`+ isAffineOpen.preimage`
`+ isAffineOpen_of_isAffineOpen_basicOpen`
`+ isAffineOpen_of_isAffineOpen_basicOpen_aux`
`+ isAffine_of_isAffineHom`
`+ isAffine_of_isAffineOpen_basicOpen`
`+ isIso_ΓSpec_adjunction_unit_app_basicOpen`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

</details>

Thanks!

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10102878310/job/27939266159)
This looks great but it would be even better if we had a more detailed module docstring.
This looks great but it would be even better if we had a more detailed module docstring.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (U : Opens (PrimeSpectrum (X.presheaf.obj (op ⊤)))) : ```

```suggestion
  ⟨f ⁻¹ᵁ U.1, IsAffineHom.isAffine_preimage _ U.prop⟩
```

```suggestion
  ⟨fun _ hU ↦ hU.map_isIso f⟩
```

```suggestion
  (quasiCompact_iff_forall_affine f).mpr
    (fun U hU ↦ (IsAffineHom.isAffine_preimage U hU).isCompact)
```

```suggestion
  fun X _ _ _  ↦ IsAffine X
```

```suggestion
    AffineTargetMorphismProperty.toProperty IsAffineHom.affineProperty f ↔
      IsAffine Y ∧ IsAffine X := by
```

```suggestion
  (isAffineHom_iff f).trans ⟨fun H U ↦ H U U.prop, fun H U hU ↦ H ⟨U, hU⟩⟩
```

```suggestion
A morphism of schemes `f : X ⟶ Y` is affine if the preimage of an arbitrary affine open subset of `Y` is affine.

It is equivalent to ask only that `Y` is covered by affine opens whose preimage is affine.

## Main theorems 

(local on target, stable under base change)
```

```suggestion
/-- A morphism of schemes `X ⟶ Y` is affine if the preimage of any affine open subset of `Y` is affine. -/
```
This PR looks very good to me, apart from the fact that this lemma (and the next) may be moved to a slightly better file.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry): Define affine morphisms
